trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: Egy objektum, amely meghatározza egy adatsort elrendezésének jelöli.

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRowPresenter and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A GridViewRowPresenter és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>támogatási osztályokat a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>a megjelenítési mód egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A megfelelő a mérete alapján sor tartalmát pozíciók <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: The area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A terület a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> megjelenítéséhez

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A tényleges <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> , amelynek használatával a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> megjelenítése

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az adatok tartalmának sorban jelenítik meg.

trans-unit.source: The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: A tipikus használatát a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] való elhelyezéséhez egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The template binds the Content property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: A sablon a tartalom tulajdonsága köti a vezérlőelem tulajdonságának használatával [templatebinding elemhez Kódkiterjesztés](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the Content property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: A következő példa bemutatja, hogyan lehet kötést létrehozni a tartalom tulajdonsága egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>számára a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>tulajdonsága egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)][!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml) ] ## XAML szöveg használati lásd a megjegyzések.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Függőségtulajdonság adatai ||| |-|-| | Alkalmazásazonosító mezőben |} | | Metaadat-tulajdonságainak beállítása `true`|}: |

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.
trans-unit.target: Egy sor tartalmát képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Az azonosítóját, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: Megadja a szükséges ahhoz, hogy a sor megjelenítéséhez.

trans-unit.source: The maximum area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A maximális terület a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> megjelenítéséhez

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A tényleges <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> , amely megjeleníti a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> terület

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> alakot adja vissza

trans-unit.source: A string that shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
trans-unit.target: Karakterlánc, amely bemutatja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>
